q: from the top. Sergio Marchionne , CEO of Chrysler and Fiat, said every vehicle launch, including the Fiat 500- Cinquecento, as it is known in Italy- is important and must be smooth. So far, touch wood, they've all gone well, Sergio Marchionne said of the 16 vehicles Chrysler has launched for 2011. "At least whatever screw-ups we had, no one noticed.
